Package com.uno.server.networking

Class ReservationServerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.uno.server.networking.ReservationServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReservationServer, Remote
public class ReservationServerImpl extends Object implements ReservationServer
This is a class with reservation server interface. This server object handles sending and receiving Reservation objects from client and server.
